author: djencks
msg: OWB-503 related changes including adapting to newly non-static ContextFactory methods

author: djencks
msg: OWB-503.  Fix a lot of problems from making ContextFactory methods non-static.  Remove circular loop between WebBeansContext and SingletonService; make SingletonService only manage WebBeansContexts

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp "jQuery ecommerce onepagecheckout issue" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4067) - OFBIZ-4067
Rohit reported a bug in the jQuery implementation (ecommerce):
With the jQuery branch being merged into the trunk, 2 new issues have been identified in the onepagecheckout, and they are:
1) the remove item link does not work in the shoppingcart panel, and
2) the cart is not updated if cart quantity is changed or promo codes are entered.
There was also a caching problem in IE.

msg: Add first test for CamelMailetProcessor and make sure the camelcontext get started if it is not started yet
